00688             last_time = ss_millitime();
00689             compose_status(hDB, hKey);
00690             if (cur_max_line < last_max_line)
00691                ss_clear_screen();

00693 
00694             j = 0;
00695             while ((j < cur_max_line) && (ststr[j][0] != '\0')) {
00696                ss_printf(0, j, "%s", ststr[j]);
00697                j++;
00698             }
00699          }
00700          ch = 0;
00701          while (ss_kbhit()) {
00702             ch = ss_getchar(0);
00703             if (ch == -1)
00704                ch = getchar();
00705             if (ch == 'R')
00706                ss_clear_screen();
00707             if ((char) ch == '!')
00708                break;
00709          }
00710          msg = cm_yield(200);
00711       } while (msg != RPC_SHUTDOWN && msg != SS_ABORT && ch != '!');
00712    }
00713    printf("\n");
00714 
00715    /* reset terminal */
00716    ss_getchar(TRUE);
